What is the name of the company?: Zania, Inc. is the name of the company.
Who is the CEO of the company?: Shruti Gupta is the CEO of Zania, Inc.
What is their vacation policy?: Zania, Inc. provides employees with paid vacation. All full-time regular employees are eligible to receive vacation time immediately upon hire or upon completion of the introductory period. The amount of vacation received each year is based on your length of service and is granted in a lump sum at the beginning of each year or accrues according to an accrual schedule determined by the Company up to a maximum annual grant. Employees must request vacation from their Manager as far in advance as possible, and the Company will generally grant requests for vacation when possible, taking business needs into consideration. Unused vacation can be carried over to the following year, and upon separation of employment, employees will be paid for earned but unused vacation time.
What is the termination policy?: The termination policy states that your employment with Zania, Inc. is on an "at-will" basis. This means your employment may be terminated at any time, with or without notice and with or without cause. The Company reserves the right to interpret, modify, or supplement the provisions of the handbook at any time.
